description.ko: 음파가 물리적 형태를 취하는 모습을 시각적으로 표현하여 보이지 않는 주파수를 액체 기하학의 걸작으로 승화시킨 작품.
description.en: A visual representation of sound waves taking physical form, turning invisible frequencies into a masterpiece of liquid geometry.

prompt: A sphere of liquid sapphire #4169E1 suspended in a silent void, erupting into sharp architectural spikes and vibrating ripples in response to a powerful #FFD700 golden resonance. Minimalist lines in #FF4500 and #32CD32 intersect the form, visualizing soundwaves through complex 3D cymatic mandalas. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. High-speed motion blur on the edges of the vibrating liquid metal, sharp focus on the central resonance. Global illumination reflects the visual consonance of sound as physical weight.
